description: This file defines a utility function `requestWithAuth` that performs HTTP requests with optional JWT authentication. It automatically attaches an access token, handles token refresh via `gatewayRefresh` upon receiving a 401 response, and retries the request once after refreshing the token.

methods.name: normalizeError(res, data)
methods.description: Normalizes an error response from the fetch request, attaching status and data details.

methods.name: requestWithAuth({ baseUrl, path, method = 'GET', body, headers, accessToken, setAccessToken, retryOn401 = true, })
methods.description: Performs an HTTP request with optional JWT token attachment, handles 401 errors by refreshing the token via gatewayRefresh, and retries once.

ctags.name: requestWithAuth
ctags.signature: ({ baseUrl, path, method = 'GET', body, headers, accessToken, setAccessToken, retryOn401 = true, })
